description: This file sets up and runs an agent with memory capabilities, utilizing external modules for AI models, memory management, and output formatting. It demonstrates initializing memory, creating an agent, and interacting with it through responses and memory retrieval.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Represents the memory component that stores and manages user memories, backed by an SQLite database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the AI agent capable of generating responses based on models and memory.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: Database interface for storing memory data in SQLite.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class for interacting with Anthropic's Claude models.

methods.name: Memory.get_user_memories
methods.description: Retrieves memories associated with a specific user ID.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Generates and outputs a response based on the current context and input.
